text_block_list.text: Just as Matikanetannhauser's training had all finished--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I want to run a little more today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fuku-chan-senpai told me my lucky item for today is the 'moon'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If I run at night, I might get some amazing power! This could be a big chance to transcend my ordinary self!
choice_data_list: Aim for a step up and do your best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'll power up with the moonlight, so look forward to it!
That day, Matikanetannhauser kept running happily even after night fell.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Muu... But the power of the moonlight...
choice_data_list: Is just looking at the moon not enough?
Is just looking at the moon not enough?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: --Ah, that's true. I wasn't specifically told to run.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Then today, I'll look at the moon in my room and get lots of power!
Saying that, Matikanetannhauser returned to the dorm.
